tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Words fall short honestly, I have the deepest admiration for a doctor like Dr. Nivedita Jha, we had the toughest 1st month changing 3 doctors in our pregnancy till we stumbled upon the lighthouse. 

I can never thank Dr. enough for the gift she helped bring to this world for us, our baby. 

She is absolutely clear in what she wants for her patient and in the best interest of the child and mother always. The only regret we have is not knowing her from before.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pre and Post Delivery Care,Obstetrics / Antenatal Care,Pregnancy care and management,Pregnancy Check Up,Cesarean Delivery,
review:
We are very happy and find ourselves very lucky to deliver our baby under the constant support, monitoring and guidance of Dr. Nivedita. We consulted her from pre-pregnancy period until the post pregnancy and I strongly recommend her. There are many good points about her and here are few of them:
-She gave us a lot of time during each visit.
-She explained us all the technical aspects related to pregnancy and this helped us to develop real good knowledge. She explained all the latest procedures and treatment plans and answered all our questions.
-Her polite nature gave me good confidence with each visit
-Her recommendations on few complications worked very effectively and during the early stages itself we developed complete trust on her.
-She also provided us the support on phone whenever was required.
-She is very professional and was available on time during the delivery and post delivery.

Thanks a lot to Dr. Nivedita!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Social Obstetrics and Gynecologist,
review: *** ******** ** *** ** *** ****** ************ ** ********** *hreatened by one of the renowned physician in Bangalore for high risk pregnancy, we had to rush to Dr. Nivedita as recommended in social media and ever since we have never looked back. It was an wonderful journey for my wife and me throughout entire pregnency period. She is very compassionate, caring and treat individual case personally. She has utmost sense of emergency and available any time over phone in emergency situations. My wife had to deliver baby at midnight following an emergency labor pain, and doctor was availble for the surgery during that critical situation. We would like to thank Dr. Nivedita for her sincere effort and guiding us mentally, physically as friend philosopher and guide. More than a doctor, she is a great human being which is most important trait for a physician. We wish her all the best for future endeavors and would highly recommend Dr. Nivedita for any  gynecological issue.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Pregnancy Check Up,Pre and Post Delivery Care,High-Risk Pregnancy Care,Caesarean Section (C Section),Pregnancy Hypertension (Preeclampsia/ Eclampsia),
review:
Dr Nivedita has a way of treating patients which makes her apart from other Doctors. She gave my wife a lot of confidence and was very approachable be it on whatsapp or calls to help her clearing any doubts. And for the treatment she prefers less medication and only suggests the medicines which are required which was most satisfying. 
During one of the scans in 7th month end, we found out a problem in the blood flow from Placenta and from there on under her guidance we monitored it via regular scans and managed it for 1 month and had C section in the beginning of 9th month. During those tough times she also gave us a lot of confidence and always said Don‚Äôt worry and still making us aware of all the possible scenarios and solutions. By gods grace and Doctors support we were blessed with a baby boy. I would highly recommend Dr Nivedita to everyone who needs guidance and humanly behaviour also along with the required treatment.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: This review is coming straight from the heart of a proud mother. Dr.Nivedita is the most caring *** *** **** ************* ****** **** * **** *** **** **** Her diagnosis from day 1 has been very informative and it helped me sail past 9 months smoothly without any hassles.Her guidance and predictions are accurate which shows that she is an expert at her work. Most importantly she is just a message away when it comes to availability.I always wanted a normal delivery and she helped me throughout my pregnancy to achieve the same. She always encouraged me to go for a normal delivery. On the 5th of this month, I delivered a healthy baby and the way she gave me strength and took care of me at the time delivery was like an angel being by my side in disguise.It would not be just for me to use the word recommend and so I am saying that you MUST visit/consult Dr.Nivedita before you go to any other doc.

She gave me the confidence throughout, now I'm blessed wid healthy baby boy.

review: Doctor's way to handle emotional state of a pregnant woman is great. She keeps the expectation to the point and is very clear towards the problem as well as solution. We had a smooth period of 9 month with small hiccups and doctor was really supportive. Really lucky to consult her from early stage of pregnancy. Everything went in the way we wanted.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Nivedita is the best doctor. As one will consult with her, one will get to know how much friendly and experienced she is. I consulted with her right from the time I conceived. Unlike the other people, who offers you the advice, which is not relevant to your pregnancy in any sense. She, on the other hand in any given situation offers you the advice, which makes you calmer and bit relaxed. My pregnancy went smoothly with her assistance.

I have been consulting for last many months and never seen her rushing and spends good amount of time with patients to clarify their doubts and issues. Always supportive and approachable over phone for any emergencies.

words will always be less to describe her.

review: Hd very good time through out my ANC days for 9 months mam has guided me in each n every step , tq so much mam ur very much humble n well hearted tq so much with ur suggestions got blessed with cute beautiful angel n all my family members r happy üòçtq for beginning apart of our life

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I believe she is one stop for all pregnancy related issues/treatment. She gives sufficient time and answers all questions. ************* *** good attitude. In emergencies she is approachable over phone which is really good.. So far fully satisfied as consultant .. Delivery yet to happen.Nano receptionists keeps changing during day, so possibilities of messing up with APPT and other things are possible.. They are just okay  like other hospitals.. Fees  is reasonable.. need to watch during delivery to find hidden things which most hospitals do.No Discount on medicine store like other shops give i.e 10 pct.. If Nano is reading the feedback.. request u to provide 10 pct off on all medicines..ThanxRakhi/Anil
reply_text: Thanks for review.. This was meant to be only doctors review... Will intimate these issues with hospital... U can also write your review for the hospital separately...

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Dr. Nivedita is very friendly and showed eagerness to understand my issue by patiently listening and asking relevant questions for further investigation. I had been suffering from menstrual disorder for a decade(prior to meeting Dr. Nivedita). She explained the diagnosis and the required treatment very clearly. I appreciate the fact that she sets very realistic expectations and is ready to clarify any doubts that the patient has. I'm seeing tremendous improvement in my health condition, all thanks to the doctor's treatment and positive attitude.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I have been visiting Dr. Nivedita since we planned our first pregnancy past 10 months and so far the journey has been very satisfied. Every time I visit her with a mind full of questions & worries but while leaving, there's always a smile & relief on my face. She makes the experience look so normal, unlike how people portray it & generally scare you. She expects us to visit her only if it is needed, she communicates over messages or a phone call. No uncessary tests or scans. I had healthy pregnancy and blessed with Baby through Normal delivery. All thanks to Dr. Nivedita for taking care of me throughout pregnancy and during delivery. Thanks a lot Dr!
reply_text: Thanks  a lot.... Keeps me going

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Wait time,
review: I had visited Dr.Nivedita for my pregnancy. She had been very helpful n friendly throughout the 9 months of pregnancy & post delivery, taking out time to answer all my queries. She gives ample time to each patient answering all their queries & taking time out to explain each n every part of the process, advising what‚Äôs best for them. Overall I have been very happy the way she has treated me during my pregnancy & would definitely recommend her for anyone who is looking for a good gynaecologist

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Dr. Nivedita hand is very good. From day one till now doctor has guided us very nicely with proper guidance, caring and now my wife is running with 8th Month.

Few Positive Points about doctor-
- Give lots of time when we meet her by clearing all our doubts
- Good mentor by motivating us
- Friendly nature
- Easy accessible through phone when we are in need
- Very co-operative 
- Well experienced 

I had suggested one of my cousin who was planning for pregnancy, when they consulted Dr. Nivedita my cousin came to know that she was having thyroid. Then doctor started medication, but the good thing is that my cousin got conceived in next month itself after getting treated by Dr. Nivedita.

I strongly recommend Dr. Nivedita *** *** ****** *** *** ******* *** *** **** ************ ** *** ******

Thank You Dr. Nivedita

Regards
Ankitha / Suman

review: very bad experience.  1st when i visited her she told me to ping her in whatsapp with reports but later when i shared the reports she didnt reply and when my husband called her she started abusing and told that she will not treat me. such a bad experience.
reply_text: I feel so sorry for such reviews. Doing 100percent for your patients... then receiving bad reviews and thrashing.... In fact I was badly abused.... for the reason that I was busy and did not reply back immediately...... Good you wrote this review..... An eye opener for me..... and definitely time to think twice before doing any favor or go over the board to help the patient. Thank you.
